page.title: 16Police, Rangeworthy
page.content: {This is the text of an interview}by local children of the community policeman. {Q.}What things do you do in a day? {A.}I may have to deal with road accidents, attend the scene of a crime, arrest people who commit crimes, even stand in for a lollipop lady who is ill. {Q.}What crimes do you deal with? {A.}From small thefts to break-ins and assaults. Anything that is a crime I will deal with. {Q.}What was your most dangerous job? {A.}When I was involved with the hippies at Stonehenge. They were trying to get to Stonehenge to hold a pop festival which had been banned. {Q.}What qualifications do you need? {A.}You need to be fit. You must have 4 '0' Levels or pass the entrance exam. You must be at least 18yrs.6mths. old.
